title: Never Mind The Cronut. Now There's An Ice Cream Sundae In A Can
teaser: The creator of the cronut — half croissant, half donut — is out with the new product: a mix of vanilla, chocolate chip and root beer ice cream with toppings in a pop-top tin, for $15.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
